title: test user login functionality
description: Verify that the /auth/login endpoint correctly authenticates users with valid email and password, and returns appropriate error messages for invalid credentials.

title: test token validation for candidates
description: Ensure the /auth/validate-token endpoint properly validates candidate tokens, accepting valid tokens and rejecting expired or malformed tokens.

title: test access to behavioral evaluation form
description: Check that the /form endpoint returns the behavioral evaluation form when provided with a valid token query parameter, and denies access or returns errors for invalid or missing tokens.

title: test administrative dashboard access
description: Validate that the /dashboard endpoint allows access only to authorized users (Admin, RH), and returns the dashboard data with correct filters, sorting, and search capabilities.

title: test candidate listing and addition
description: Test the /api/candidates GET endpoint to list candidates with correct data, and the POST endpoint to add a new candidate with valid input, ensuring proper validation and error handling.

title: test candidate retrieval and deletion by id
description: Verify that the /api/candidate/{id} GET endpoint returns the correct candidate data for a valid ID, and the DELETE endpoint removes the candidate, handling invalid IDs gracefully.

title: test gupy webhook candidate synchronization
description: Ensure the /api/gupy-webhook POST endpoint correctly receives candidate data from Gupy, processes it to generate unique tokens, and synchronizes candidate information in the system.
